name: Massive small: from masterplan to microplan - how small changes can make big differences
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Large scale redevelopment may not be the best way to promote resilient and adaptable neighbourhoods and communities in our cities. Often more modest interventions can provide greater improvements. How do we create a structural framework within which incremental improvements can happen? How can planners become enablers for this process? This seminar will explore this approach through successful schemes and case studies.
